ðŸ“– Summary: frp is a fast reverse proxy that enables users to expose local servers, even those behind NAT or firewalls, to the internet. It supports various protocols like TCP, UDP, HTTP, and HTTPS, and offers features such as P2P connectivity, encryption, compression, and monitoring. frp simplifies the process of accessing internal services from external networks.
